CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 2, 1955, pg. 10, reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Gilbert E. Davis...happy pair - Harris Photo." Portions of accompanying article reads: "Oscar Vaughns Entertain For Daughter and Groom - Mr. and Mrs. Oscar Vaughn entertained hundreds of friends at the Greene Hearthe [Hearth] recently at a reception honoring their daughter and son-in-law, Mr. and Mrs. Gilbert Davis. She is the former Pauline Vaughn, who was married to Mr. Davis last Dec. 30....The bride, who wore a gown of rough silk in powder puff pink will live in Washington with her groom who is stationed there as a member of the Air Force.  Complete silver service for eight was the gift of the senior aides, who included Mmes. William Cuthbert, Clarence Blow, Paul Knott, Edward Lewis, Luke McDaniel, Lester Holmes, Thomas Barton, James Calloway, Harry Conrad, Richard Jones, Julius Howell, Susie Yates, Harold Butler, Paul Williams and T. B. Hamilton.  Junior aides gave the bride a deep fryer.  They included Florence Holmes, Mmes Sarah Lewis, Ethel Hardine and Parthenia Brown."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women, possibly including Mrs. Cuthbert, Mrs. Blow, Mrs. Knott, groom Gilbert E. Davis, bride Pauline Vaughn Davis, and possibly Mrs. and Mr. Oscar Vaughn, in Greene Hearth
